LanguageData.BabyDecoration.label: дитяча прикраса
LanguageData.BabyDecoration.description: Прикраса для дітей. Дитячі прикраси задовільняють потребу дитини у розвагах, коли дорослі граються з нею. Поставте ці прикраси навколо дитячої зони для гри.
LanguageData.BabySleepingSpot.label: baby sleeping spot
LanguageData.BabySleepingSpot.description: Designates a spot on the ground where people should leave a baby. Not comfortable.
LanguageData.Blackboard.label: blackboard
LanguageData.Blackboard.description: A flat stone-like surface for writing on with chalk. Placed near a lesson desk, blackboards increase childrens' learning rate during lessons. Up to three blackboards can be used at a time.
LanguageData.Blackboard.comps.CompStatEntry.reportTex: When near a desk where a lesson is taking place, this building increases the student's learning rate. This effect can stack up to three times.
LanguageData.Crib.label: crib
LanguageData.Crib.description: A cozy bed with safe latticed sides, perfect for a sleepy baby. A high quality crib will make a baby happy. Multiple cribs can be placed in a bedroom without turning it into a barracks.
LanguageData.SchoolDesk.label: school desk
LanguageData.SchoolDesk.description: A desk where adults can teach lessons to children.
LanguageData.SchoolDesk.comps.CompStatEntrySchoolDesk: A multiplier on how quickly children learn during lessons which are assisted by this.
LanguageData.ToyBox.label: toy box
LanguageData.ToyBox.description: A toy box containing many small toys. Toy boxes can be used to play with babies, satisfying their need for play.
